info.author: Lethe
info.description:
=============
Cache Machine
=============

Cache Machine provides automatic caching and invalidation for Django models
through the ORM.
Add full cache support for model sql functions.

For django-cache-machine full docs, see https://cache-machine.readthedocs.org/en/latest/.

.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/jbalogh/django-cache-machine.png
  :target: https://travis-ci.org/jbalogh/django-cache-machine


Requirements
------------

Cache Machine requires Django 1.3+.  It was written and tested on Python 2.7.


Installation
------------


Get it from `pypi <http://pypi.python.org/pypi/django-cache-zoom>`_::

    pip install django-cache-zoom


Running Tests
-------------


Get it from `github <http://github.com/lethe3000/django-cache-zoom>`_::

    git clone git://github.com/lethe3000/django-cache-zoom.git
    cd django-cache-zoom
    pip install -r requirements.txt
    fab test
info.name: django-cache-zoom
info.summary: Automatic caching and invalidation for Django models through the ORM.
info.html_description:
Cache Machine provides automatic caching and invalidation for Django models through the ORM. Add full cache support for model sql functions.

For django-cache-machine full docs, see https://cache-machine.readthedocs.org/en/latest/.

Requirements

Cache Machine requires Django 1.3+. It was written and tested on Python 2.7.

Installation

Get it from pypi:

pip install django-cache-zoom

Running Tests

Get it from github:

git clone git://github.com/lethe3000/django-cache-zoom.git
cd django-cache-zoom
pip install -r requirements.txt
fab test
